title: I have doubts = Tengo dudas [Destinos Pt 2: Ep 47]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: Episode number 47 of Series "Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2". Episode 47: Carlos talks to Arturo about Gloria's problem. Arturo fulfills his promise to Rosaria to unite Angela and Roberto with Don Castillo, even though he does not recognise them. The Castillo family lend Carlos support with his problem and have an important decision to make about the factory. Raquel and Arturo discuss their future and although Raquel cannot leave Los Angeles and her family to move to Buenos Aires, Arturo is prepared to come to America instead. No new vocabulary is introduced.
related_objects: Series; S01216; Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2; Active; 1992
